results.title: Subchronic metformin pretreatment enhances novel object recognition memory task in forebrain ischemia: behavioural, molecular, and electrophysiological studies.
results.text_hl: Subchronic @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pretreatment enhances novel object recognition memory task in @<m>DISEASE_Forebrain_Defects</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566067 @@@forebrain ischemia@@@: behavioural, molecular, and electrophysiological studies.

results.title: Pre-Treatment with Metformin in Comparison with Post-Treatment Reduces Cerebral Ischemia Reperfusion Induced Injuries in Rats.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10116 @@@Rats@@@ were divided into: control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pre-treatment, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ post-treatment and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ pre and post continuous treatment groups.

citations.NLM: Karimipour M, Shojaei Zarghani S, Mohajer Milani M, Soraya H. Pre-Treatment with Metformin in Comparison with Post-Treatment Reduces Cerebral Ischemia Reperfusion Induced Injuries in Rats. Bull Emerg Trauma. 2018 Apr;6(2):115-121. PMID: 29719841
